column1: Cassilândia is a municipality located in the Brazilian state of Mato Grosso do Sul. Its population was 21
Cassilândia is located in the northeastern part of the state
column2: in the border with Goiás State and is surrounded by beautiful landscapes. It has an international airport and two universities
column3: a private and a state one. The city is known by its famous rodeo party which takes place in late July
